EmailTemplate.name: Pre-requisite for Application update
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre-requisite for IXM WEB Application update to version 3.0.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pre-requisites:
System Requirements CPU Requirement 2.4 GHz Quad Core RAM Requirement 8 GB RAM
Hard Disk Requirement 50 GB Hard disk Network Interface TCP/IP, RS232, RS485, Wi-Fi WEB Server Requirement Microsoft IIS v10.0 Microsoft .Net Framework Version 4.8 Database SQL Server 2014 or higher License Free. Annual Maintenance Cost for updates and support. (2nd year onwards) Operating Systems Windows 10 Professional Version Windows 11 Professional Version Windows Server 2016 Standard Windows Server 2019 Supported Browsers Google Chrome TM version 97.0 or later Mozilla Firefox version 96.0 or later Microsoft Edge version 102.0 or later Apple Safari version 14.1.2 or later (Mac OS only) Supported Devices Desktop, Notebook, Smartphone, Tablet
 We may require access to the database during the update process—requesting permission in advance.  CPU and RMA capacity may change according to total number of devices and total numbers of employees in IXM WEB.  Also please share the following o IXM WEB Machine key (text Format) o Device list o Total number of Employees in IXM WEB
Backup:  Take a database backup.  Backup the IXM WEB folder located at C:\Program Files (x86) \Invixium\.  Expect 4-5 hours of downtime for firmware updates. Application updates will not affect operations.
